Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $12000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $15000. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive setup service and a 1-year warranty. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
